Convert csv data files into wq formats

Source: R/dt_to_wq.R
dt_to_wq.Rd

Convert csv data files into wq formats

dt_to_wq(measure.vars, src.dt, path, start.date, end.date, interval = "1 day")

Arguments

measure.vars

vector of measure variables. Can be integer (corresponding measure column numbers) or character (measure column names) vector. If missing, all non-id columns will be assigned to it.
src.dt

A data.table object. If a data.frame object is provided, it will be converted to a data.table object using setDT.
path

Character. A character indicating the path of the .wq files to be saved.
start.date

Character. A character of desired date ('2000-01-01')
end.date

Character. A character of desired date ('2000-01-01')
interval

Character. Increment of the sequence. See seq.Date for details.

Contents
